```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(flextable)
library(pander)
library(magrittr)
load('sfn_datapaper_data.RData')
```

## Tables

```{r tabRef, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE, results="asis"}
qflextable(sp_genus_all) %>% 
  autofit() %>% 
  set_header_labels(sp_genus = "Genus", n="Number of trees") %>% 
   bold( i = 1,  part = "header") %>% 
   set_caption('Table X. Number of trees per genus')

```
